title: The Trailer: How campaign rhetoric about child porn made it to the Supreme Court hearing

sentence: As Daily Kos reported last month, with Trump's blessing, Jones bolted from his gubernatorial race against Brian Kemp to try his hand at the 10th Congressional District race in Dekalb Countya district he doesn't even live in.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: 'Black Donald Trump' actually voted Dem in 2020 primaries

sentence: Right here in your state, we are going to throw out your spineless RINO Governor Brian Kemp, and we are going to replace him with a fearless America First patriot in David Perdue,? Trump plans to say.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Exclusive  Trump at Georgia Rally: A Vote for RINO Brian Kemp' Is a Vote for Stacey Abrams'
The Stroke That Nearly Broke the Democratic Majority
